Player - Class in sample
The class Player represents a player object with name, playerID, current amount of cash on hand, position on current tile it is in, and number of properties, railroad, and utilities it owns.
Player(String) - Constructor for class sample.Player
This constructor receives the name of the player.
playerController - Class in sample
 
playerController() - Constructor for class sample.playerController
 
Property - Class in sample
The class Property represents a property object with color, multiplier, property type, rent, owner, foot traffic and corresponding prices upon purchase.
Property(String) - Constructor for class sample.Property
This constructor receives the property's name to be instantiated as an object.
